sense.def:
Kadar človek
administers a country, company, or institution
je odgovoren za vodenje neke države, podjetja ali ustanove.

seg.quote: She had a huge department to administer.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
administers something
poskrbi, da je tisto pravilno narejeno ali opravljeno.

seg.quote: Experts administer the tests and publish the results.
The prison officers helped to administer a sedative to him.
